channel.title: Comments on: Sleeping On The Metro

item.title: By: Jordan
item.dc:creator: Jordan
item.description: I can't think of a place more worthy of sleep.
item.content:encoded: I can’t think of a place more worthy of sleep.

item.title: By: Paulo
item.dc:creator: Paulo
item.description: I was beside someone who was sleeping standing up this morning. He was leaning on the glass partition by the door, but his eyes were closed and he would occasionally snore.
item.content:encoded: I was beside someone who was sleeping standing up this morning. He was leaning on the glass partition by the door, but his eyes were closed and he would occasionally snore.
